original_title: Finance Secretary Called to Explain Sri Lanka’s Financial Bankruptcy
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Secretary of the Ministry of Finance, Mahinda Siriwardena, has been summoned to appear before the Select Committee of Parliament to Investigate Causes for Financial Bankruptcy declared by the Government today at 2 pm.
The Committee, established to investigate the government's declaration of bankruptcy, will seek answers from Siriwardena about the root causes of the country's economic collapse.
